subject: Soccer
Women's World Cup (Soccer)
Women and Girls
lead_paragraph: Three days after the Women’s World Cup final, Abby Wambach and her magicJack team played a Women’s Professional Soccer match before a sold-out stadium in Rochester.
snippet: Three days after the Women’s World Cup final, Abby Wambach and her magicJack team played a Women’s Professional Soccer match before a sold-out stadium in Rochester.
